alert.note: Alert for Millard (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 3:28PM MDT until July 19 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Millard County in central Utah... * Until 415 PM MDT * At 328 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 28 miles northeast of Garrison, or 31 miles east of Baker, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kings Canyon. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 21 and 39. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
